show_name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School: Despair Arc (TV)
other_title: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibōgamine Gakuen: Zetsubō Hen
ダンガンロンパ３ The End of 希望ヶ峰学園 絶望編 (Japanese)
plot: Hope’s Peak High School is a special school that nurtures those with exceptional talents and abilities. While only top students are a part of the main course, anyone can join the preparatory course, like Haijme Hinata has. Hinata wants nothing more than to be part of the talented elite, but his desires lead him to a fateful encounter that drives the future of the school into despair.
opening_theme: "Kami Iro Awase" (カミイロアワセ) by binaria
ending_theme: "Zettai Kibō Birthday" (絶対希望バースデー;The Birthday of Absolute Hope) by Megumi Ogata
insert_song: "Tsubasa o Kudasai" (翼をください; "Please, Give Me Wings") by Megumi Toyoguchi (ep 7)
